metadata.Title: CVE-2022-47519 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.0.11. Missingvalidation of IEEE80211_P2P_ATTR_OPER_CHANNEL indrivers/net/wireless/microchip/wilc1000/cfg80211.c in the WILC1000 wirelessdriver can trigger an out-of-bounds write when parsing the channel listattribute from Wi-Fi management frames.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47519` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
linux-image-5.15.0-67-generic-lpae - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-generic-64k - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1031-aws - 5.15.0-1031.35~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1034-azure - 5.15.0-1034.41~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1019-azure-fde - 5.15.0-1034.41~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1030-gcp - 5.15.0-1030.37~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1028-gke - 5.15.0-1028.33~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1026-intel-iotg - 5.15.0-1026.31~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-lowlatency - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-67-lowlatency-64k - 5.15.0-67.74~20.04.1
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.15.0-1030-oracle - 5.15.0-1030.36~20.04.1
No subscription required
